title: in game client issues
body: when i get into game the client kind of glitches game page kinda shifts downwards a little then you can see (the page title *league of legends client*. you cant see the mana bar at the bottom and when i use unlocked screen and try to go down the screen doesn't move down but works up sideways and upwards and that forces me to use lock screen which im not that used to. you can also when i try to position the page so you can see it all it will go back being glitched. oi and i was using the new client ( tried re launching the client)

replies.body: dw guys i fixed it by in setting you set it back to default
